4010.name: My Sunday lunch
4010.description: For Sunday lunch me and my family had soup made of vegetables (carrots, peas, parsley, celery); then turkey meat (with spices: salt, pepper, rosemary, oregano) and pasta with tuna (with tomatoes and cucumbers). For dessert we had fruit salad of bananas, grapes and peaches. And whats the origin of this groceries?
